feed.title: portracker Releases

entry.title: New release for portracker: Stable Release
New release for portracker: Release v1.0.2: Security Hardening and Collector Fixes
entry.content:
This is a patch release that addresses key security aspects and improves data collection accuracy.

Fixes & Improvements

  • Removed middleware dependency: The application no longer requires mounting the TrueNAS middleware socket.
  • Docker collector fix: Container creation timestamps are now correctly included by the Docker collector for more accurate data.
  • Updated documentation: Update deployment instructions accordingly.
